agents.name: HazardPrioritizationAgent
agents.output:
{
  "prioritized_hazards": [
    {
      "type": "ppe_violation",
      "description": "Hard hat left on the floor, worker not wearing head protection",
      "severity": "high",
      "location": "warehouse floor, near shelving",
      "recommendations": "Ensure workers wear hard hats at all times in warehouse; train staff on PPE compliance",
      "priority": "high",
      "rationale": "Failure to wear head protection in areas where falling objects are possible exposes workers to severe injuries. This is a major safety risk but not currently life-threatening.",
      "recommended_timeline": "24h"
    },
    {
      "type": "floor_safety",
      "description": "Worker appears to have suffered an injury on the floor",
      "severity": "high",
      "location": "warehouse aisle near shelving",
      "recommendations": "Investigate cause of injury, keep aisles clear, and enforce ladder and equipment safety procedures",
      "priority": "high",
      "rationale": "A reported injury on the floor indicates a major issue that could lead to further harm if not addressed promptly. This represents a significant safety risk requiring urgent action.",
      "recommended_timeline": "24h"
    }
  ]
}

prioritized_hazards.description: Hard hat left on the floor, worker not wearing head protection
prioritized_hazards.recommendations: Ensure workers wear hard hats at all times in warehouse; train staff on PPE compliance
prioritized_hazards.rationale: High severity due to increased risk of head injury from falling objects in an area where PPE is required, presenting a major safety and compliance concern.

prioritized_hazards.description: Worker appears to have suffered an injury on the floor
prioritized_hazards.recommendations: Investigate cause of injury, keep aisles clear, and enforce ladder and equipment safety procedures
prioritized_hazards.rationale: High severity as there is evidence of an actual injury, indicating unsafe conditions posing a major risk to worker safety that must be addressed promptly.
